title: Vectors - truck distance with law of cosines

content.prompt: Two delivery trucks leave a distribution center at the same time and travel along straight roads that differ in direction by Ï€3 radians. One truck averages a speed of 55 miles per hour, and the other truck averages a speed of 65 miles per hour. To the nearest mile, how far apart, in a straight line, are the two trucks from each other after 2 hours?

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
